channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: Mirror』誌のアリソン・フィリップス編集長は4年近く務めた後、1月末で退任する予定で、後任には『Reach Magazines』誌のキャロライン・ウォーターストンEICが就任する（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
Mirror Editor-in-Chief Alison Phillips plans to step down at the end of January after almost four years, succeeded by Reach Magazines EIC Caroline Waterston  —  Mirror editor-in-chief Alison Phillips will step down at the end of January after almost six years leading the brand.

item.title: 2017年にスタートし、幅広いテーマを扱い、リスナーが全額出資する週刊Blindboy Podcastのホスト兼クリエイターであるBlindboyのプロフィール（Daniel Dylan Wray/The Guardian）
item.description:
Daniel Dylan Wray / The Guardian:
A profile of Blindboy, host and creator of the weekly Blindboy Podcast, which launched in 2017, covers a wide-range of subjects, and is fully listener-funded  —  He wears plastic bags as an ‘autistic protest’ and makes podcasts about everything from fish fingers to the Baileys sex cult.

item.title: ルミネイト世界の上位10K曲に占めるヒンディー語の割合は、2022年の6.1%から2023年には7.8%に増加、英語は62.1%から54.9%、スペイン語は11.8%から10.1%に減少（Ananya Bhattacharya/Quartz）
item.description:
Ananya Bhattacharya / Quartz:
Luminate: Hindi songs' share of the top 10K global tracks grew from 6.1% in 2022 to 7.8% in 2023; English fell from 62.1% to 54.9%, Spanish from 11.8% to 10.1%  —  Bollywood music and indie musicians — hip-hop artists especially — are fueling the Hindi music streaming phenomena

item.title: ニールセン：ピーコックが独占配信したNFL AFCワイルドカードゲームは「米国史上最もストリーミングされたイベント」であり、総視聴者数は27.6M、ピーク平均視聴者数は24.6Mだった（Richard Lawler/The Verge）。
item.description:
Richard Lawler / The Verge:
Nielsen: Peacock's exclusive stream of the NFL AFC Wild Card game was the “most-streamed event in US history”, with 27.6M total viewers and a 24.6M peak average  —  The streams we were watching mostly held up, if you saw the game, how was the experience for you?

item.title: アップルが2023年9月にPodcastsアプリのエピソードの自動ダウンロード方法を変更したことで、一部のポッドキャストのダウンロード数が劇的に減少した（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Apple's September 2023 change to how its Podcasts app automatically downloaded episodes has dramatically curtailed download numbers for some podcasts  —  The News  —  Apple has quietly tightened its reporting of how many people listen to podcasts, sending shock waves through …

item.title: メモBIのバーバラ・ペン最高経営責任者（CEO）は、ネリ・オックスマンのMIT学位論文の盗用に関する報道は厳密かつ公正なものであったと内部調査で判明したと発表。
item.description:
Sam Jones / Financial Times:
Memo: BI CEO Barbara Peng says an internal review found reporting on plagiarism in Neri Oxman's MIT thesis to be rigorous and fair; Axel Springer stands by BI  —  Owner Axel Springer says it ‘stands by’ publication amid dispute with academic and her husband Bill Ackman

item.title: 英国を拠点とする音楽ビデオストリーミングサービスの米国での立ち上げ、ライセンス契約、収益、主な競合他社などについて、Roxiのロブ・ルイスCEOにQ&A（Georg Szalai/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / The Hollywood Reporter:
Q&A with Roxi CEO Rob Lewis on launching the UK-based music video streaming service in the US, licensing deals, generating revenue, key competitors, and more  —  “Building a global a global music video streaming service is way harder than building a Netflix or Disney+,” says Rob Lewis.

item.title: ワシントン・ポスト紙に40年近く寄稿し、鋭いウィットで知られたピューリッツァー賞受賞のテレビ批評家、トム・シェールズ氏が79歳で死去（ワシントン・ポスト紙）
item.description:
Washington Post:
Tom Shales, a Pulitzer Prize-winning TV critic who spent nearly 40 years writing for The Washington Post and was known for his incisive wit, dies at 79  —  He spent nearly 40 years writing for The Washington Post and was known for his incisive and barbed commentary

item.title: DirecTVとTegnaは、2023年11月30日以降、～500万人の米国顧客に影響を与えたTegna 64局の番組停波を終了させるキャリッジ契約に合意（Dade Hayes/Deadline）
item.description:
Dade Hayes / Deadline:
DirecTV and Tegna reach a carriage deal to end the programming blackout of 64 Tegna stations that affected ~5M US customers since November 30, 2023  —  DirecTV and major station group Tegna have struck a carriage deal, ending a programming blackout that began November 30 and affected roughly 5 million customers across the U.S..

item.title: GBニュースのクリストファー・ホープとグロリア・デ・ピエロに、放送局への入社、新番組の立ち上げ、「視聴者に根ざしている」ことなどについてインタビューした（Dominic Ponsford/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Dominic Ponsford / Press Gazette:
An interview with GB News' Christopher Hope and Gloria De Piero on joining the broadcaster, launching their new show, being “rooted in the viewers”, and more  —  The pair have launched a new PMQs show and say GB News is “rooted in the viewers” not spads.

item.title: 1951年にKSTL-TVに入社し、LAで女性初のオンエア・ニュースを担当したテレビ・ラジオの先駆的ジャーナリスト、ルース・アシュトン・テイラーが101歳で死去（Cynthia Littleton/Variety）
item.description:
Cynthia Littleton / Variety:
Ruth Ashton Taylor, a pioneering TV and radio journalist who was the first woman to have an on-air news role in LA when she joined KSTL-TV in 1951, died at 101  —  Ruth Ashton Taylor, a pioneering TV and radio journalist who worked with Edward R. Murrow at CBS News and was a fixture on the air in Los Angeles for decades, has died.

item.title: HBOは過去20年のうち17年間、エミー賞ノミネートをリードしてきたが、ヒット番組が終了し、より幅広い視聴者を求めるマックスへのブランド変更に伴い、その支配力は長続きしないかもしれない（Washington Post紙）
item.description:
Washington Post:
HBO led Emmy nominations for 17 of the past 20 years, but its dominance may not last as hit shows end and the company's rebrand to Max seeks a broader audience  —  Once again, HBO has the most nominations of any network or platform going into the 75th Emmys awards ceremony.

item.title: ケヴィン・シストロムは、ニュース共有アプリ「Artifact」は「継続的な投資を正当化できるほど市場機会は大きくない」と結論づけ、閉鎖すると発表した（Kevin Systrom/Artifact News）。
item.description:
Kevin Systrom / Artifact News:
Kevin Systrom says news sharing app Artifact will shut down after concluding that “the market opportunity isn't big enough to warrant continued investment”  —  To our Artifact Users and Partners:  —  We've made the decision to wind down operations of the Artifact app.

item.title: マイピローのマイク・リンデルCEOによると、フォックスはマイピローの広告を受け付けていない。情報筋によると、リンデルが2023年8月以降広告費を支払っていないため、広告が一時停止されているとのこと（Jeremy Barr/Washington Post）
item.description:
Jeremy Barr / Washington Post:
MyPillow CEO Mike Lindell says that Fox is not accepting MyPillow ads; a source says ads are paused because Lindell has not paid for his ads since August 2023  —  Lindell said he's been ‘canceled,’ but a source with knowledge of the situation said he just hasn't paid his bills

item.title: The CW、ロゴから "The "を削除し、"ホットソース "カラーを採用するなど、ロゴとブランド・アイデンティティの "進化 "を発表（Michael Schneider/Variety）
item.description:
Michael Schneider / Variety:
The CW unveils an “evolution” in its logo and brand identity, including dropping “The” from its logo and a new “hot sauce” color palette  —  The CW is spicing up its look.  Timed to Sunday's airing of the Critics Choice Awards, the Nexstar-run netlet is unveiling an …
